trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around November 3rd 2008
Summary: Strange rectangle in the sky disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsA coworker and I had just landed at Sky Harbor airport from Seattle, rented a car and were approaching a Freeway onramp (Interstate 10?)to head for Mesa. It was around 3:00PM, clear, sunny, and there was lots of traffic. My coworker was driving, I was the navigator, and I noticed straight ahead - maybe 2 miles away from the airport and a few hundred feet in the air - a rectangle in the sky, with mountains in the background. I immediately assumed it to be an advertising banner being pulled by an airplane. Still, it seemed out of place, it didn't appear to be moving, and I couldn't see an airplane pulling it (but because it was between us and the mountains, I figured I was unable to distinguish the plane from the terrain behind it) I pointed the object out to my coworker, she saw it too and remarked that it was odd. Her focus though quickly returned to merging into freeway traffic. As I continued to observe the object, I assumed the plane pulling it must have turned to head directly away from us and towards the mountains, because the rectangle got thinner and thinner until it disappeared completely. I mean literally, seconds later there was no object, no airplane, nothing. I scanned the area for another minute or two as we drove, there was nothing there. I said, half-kidding, "that must have been a UFO!" The entire sighting was maybe 30 seconds.
